1.text: Get a building permit if you need one.

3.text: String support beams lengthwise across the deck piers.

4.text: Attach joists to the support beams and separate them with blocking.

5.text: Nail plywood sheeting to the joists to form the shed floor.

6.text: Build the framework for all four walls.

7.text: Build rafters across the roof and separate them with blocking.

8.text: Nail plywood sheeting to the rafters to form the roof.

10.text: Add tar paper to the roof.
